website_summaries.verdict: Perfect toaster for those who like thick-sliced bread or bagels.
pros: Convenient features like high-lift toast boost to avoid reaching into the toaster with your fingers
Auto-off shuts downs the toaster after a cycle
cons: The shade selector can be finicky, resulting in under or over-toasting

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster.
customer_reviews.text: When I started to look for a new toaster, I remembered the most helpful review I had read the last time I needed to purchase a new toaster, namely, "It's a toaster." So, I plugged in the model number of my broken toaster and purchased this updated model version. It works fine, and it does have a smaller / narrower counter footprint. So, remember: "It is a toaster..."
customer_reviews.author: Still calls them records

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Machine. Can't beat the ease of it.
customer_reviews.text: Full size croissant sandwich maker. I love this machine. It thaws my frozen bread perfectly. Toast my Costco croissants to perfection. Hot dog buns, hamburger buns, etc. I am just mad I didn't get the four slot toaster. Great machine for any household and the price is even better. You don't need a thousand buttons or options. You need crispy bread! This does it to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not A Powerful Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster will toast your bread and bagels to a nice golden brown color if the knob is turned all the way up. If you like your toast a little burned around the edges as I do, or even just a darker brown, it's hasn't the power to do it in one cycle. Push it down a second time, though, and it will incinerate it if you like.
customer_reviews.author: R.Franz

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an ancient Cuisinart toaster. Since I almost never toast bread, but always toast bagels, I thought this would be a good alternative. The toaster does a decent job, but I find that, if I do not put the shade selector on the highest number, the bagels get warm enough, but they do not really toast. I think that buying this toaster was a good idea, and I like that it can fit even larger sized bagels with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Radoff

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months,
customer_reviews.text: I had a perfectly good white plastic toaster, had it for 8 years, worked great, gave it to goodwill when my pretty new toaster arrived. This is an attractive toaster, light weight, slim design. I threw it in the trash today when it stopped working in just 2 months. It toasted unevenly. Due to the metal around the top, it would burn your fingers when removing a toasted item. Sure wish I had my cheap, white plastic, reliable, working great ugly toaster back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster because our old one didn’t have slots large enough for bagels and it was old. This toaster is great and has a blue light that comes on when it’s in use. There is also a cancel button that will pop the bread up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. This toaster doesn’t toast!
customer_reviews.text: I missed my window of return. I optimistically thought that perhaps it just needed to “break in”. This toaster deserves minus stars! It doesn’t toast! The picture that I uploaded is typical if not better than most days. I am not going to donate this appliance to charity for fear someone else will lose their money as well when it appears in a thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The slots are nice and large. The defrost feature is nice. It has the bagel feature and we've used it. Nice that you can "boost" the bread up, since I often buy smallish bakery breads that are difficult to reach without this feature. It seems to take a while to toast, but honestly, this my 4th toaster in my adult life and I've always felt every single one took too long to toast. LOL
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Bush

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster, so.
customer_reviews.text: It makes the bread crunchy. What more could a girl want? One thing I will say though -- for a "wide slot" toaster I was surprised to find that it's still not wide enough to accommodate a wider, flatter bread like you often see with rye or pumpernickel. I still have to cut a bit off the end to get them to fit, but not very much, so I'm not too miffed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mae Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster shocked at how good it is
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at what I got. I figured 20 bucks won’t get me anything good but I needed this by Thursday for my nephew visiting kids love pop tarts lol So ordered it got here fast opened it was impressed on the style of it the design is cute and it’s light weight. Used it in some toast just now came out perfect on heat 3 great find
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster Nov. 22, 2019 -- 29 days ago. Never once did it brown toast on the first try. Always browned it on the second, but not before turning the bread into rock hard inedible crap. Today, it died. Completely, totally died. The modern toaster was invented in 1919 -- 100 years ago. Toasters are the most used household appliance of all time. You would think with that kind of history and popularity, Hamilton Beach could make an inexpensive product that actually toasted bread on the first try and lasted longer than *almost a full month*. If I still had the box, I'd send it back. Complete trash.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster
customer_reviews.text: When you first open the toaster, you will want to run the toaster for a couple of cycles in a well-ventilated room (or outdoors if you have the option). The product will produce a very bad chemical smell that will fade after you run the product a few times. I ran the toaster about 5 times without any bread in it to completely get rid of the smell. After that, it works perfectly as a toaster. I only really toast white bread and found this toaster adequate for that use case.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Toaster looks nice and works great! The bagel setting is a neat option that only toasts the insides of the bagel slices if you prefer a softer outside. It also gives a consistent toasting experience as opposed to my previous toaster, which would burn your stuff one time and barely brown it another time. Adjusting the level of toasting is easy and the knob has clear adjustment settings. Assuming it holds up, this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Browncoats Unite!Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: IT'S PERFECT SLIM SIZE, TAKES UP NO ROOM AND I  HAVE MY TOAST, ITS JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE A MICROWAVE, AND AN AIRFRYER BUT NOTHING MAKES TOAST LIKE A REAL TOASTER. i DIDN'T WANT TO SPEND A LOT OF MONEY AND i WANTED JUST A TOASTER THAT DIDN'T TAKE UP A LOT OF ROOM, THIS BUTTON TO POP UP EARLIER IF YOU WANT. IT ALSO HAS A TRAY TO CLEAN THE CRUMBS.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Daniels

customer_reviews.title: A good solid toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the openings are wide and can fit bagels and aren’t super thin that make putting one slice of bread in a challenge. I didn’t like the fact that when it was done it didn’t ding or pop up and it got jammed a few times. It’s easy to fix by pushing up with a little pressure. The design is sleek and fits in well with the other appliances on my kitchen. The features are easy to use and it doesn’t burn my bread/bagels even on the highest setting which my old one used to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chia Seed

customer_reviews.title: does what it should!
customer_reviews.text: works like it should, easy to use! i really like the bagel setting. something to note- I usually put my toast on the 4 setting, I find that with this particular product to get the same result i need to do 5 or more. probably just a difference in brand from this and my last toaster, it works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It deserves ZERO stars but Amazon apparently can't deliver that truth in their ratings system. I've had this 4 months and it now only drys out the bread on the bagel side/outside panel totally cold. Total crap.
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: Toaster has many features.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. The bagels toast well on one side while the other side is warm and soft. The appliance is so light weight, wide for thick breads, if bread is small.......you can lift lever to reach the bread—so you won’t get burnt, and the sides of the toaster do not get hot. It’s worth the money. I would recommend this item for the person who love bagels and toast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique Feature
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster except for getting use to how to defrost (e.g. bagels) and then toast. Otherwise it is light, makes great toast and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another Hamilton Beach product again. Our toaster of many years stopped working so we replaced it with this one. I have never seen such uneven toasting. Sometimes the toast will just pop right out after 15 seconds. Very inconsistent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Toaster for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: It nicely toast bread, bagels, pound cakes, etc. I like my toast toasty, meaning well-browned and a bit crunchy on the edges. I have to crank up the dia to almost the highest, but it brown and toasts beautifully without burning anything. Good deal here~
customer_reviews.author: NW Writer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not uneven browning of toast...
customer_reviews.text: Product works great...as expected. You can put wider or longer slices of bread. Browns evenly. Only thing, it feels cheap because it is lightweight and at times it is kind of hard to keep the lever down every so often when lowering the bread into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Problems with this toaster: 1. Always toasts unevenly (the side towards the middle is much more done). 2. Very light weight construction (flimsy) 3. The top of the bread is above the heating elements. 4. Made in China We had an old Hamilton Beach toaster that was excellent until it stopped working. This new toaster does not compare. Update: Toaster failed after 3 months. Save your money and do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M. Telford

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one week
customer_reviews.text: This toaster stopped working after one week When I put toast into racks, push down the light goes on & then off half-way down and will not toast. I have tried many times and it will not work Not satisfied with product
customer_reviews.author: John Pritz

customer_reviews.title: Its junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster despite the negative reviews, my mistake. It's junk. I don't even understand why a company would produce a product that doesn't even do what it's made to do. It can't toast an english muffin on the highest setting, not even in bagel mode. Regular bread barely gets any color either. Absolutely junk, and Amazon should be ashamed for selling it.
customer_reviews.author: William C Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold large slices of bread, they stick out the top. But it toasts pretty well. It is a little on the flimsy side, but it was very inexpensive. Not bad for what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: dogsmom

customer_reviews.title: Good overall toaster, very pleasing appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice looking toaster. Consistent toasting. However, the toast is a tiny bit lighter on the bottom. I don't have toast often. Ican live with that, my last toaster either burned or had to toast 2x to get toast on the same setting. This is a good overall toaster priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Hassie

customer_reviews.title: this one doesn't have them and promises that everything is easy to reach - this is not always the case
customer_reviews.text: Had the previous model that had the tongs, this one doesn't have them and promises that everything is easy to reach - this is not always the case. I wish they included a new pair of tongs with this one. It's going to be a PITA to clean after a few years as they have not innoviated in any way possible with the crumb tray or the ability to open and clean the device.
customer_reviews.author: sdanzzz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months. Lever no longer stays down so won't begin toasting. Hamilton Beach customer service not very helpful. Fist they said item was out of warranty even though included paperwork said item was covered for 1 yr. Finally agreed to replace but want $12.50 for shipping. Would not recommend. Will never buy another Hamilton Beach item.
customer_reviews.author: RJG

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple, extremely light-weight, and does the job. I prefer not to use the bagel feature because it doesn't seem to toast it sufficiently. But the normal heat works great with bagels and toast and waffles,.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: good for the price :( but not better
customer_reviews.text: its good for the price. It is not the best. I don't get proper toasting on settings. it has its own mind but I only paid small amount. I bought it cuz of the size. Its not wide, long which is what I needed for my space. It is definitely not any wider than the regular toaster as it is advertised. I doubt if it will toast a bagel properly.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: IT. TOASTS. WELL.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best cheap toaster I've ever seen. It toasts thick toast incredibly quickly on just the first notch of the time setting. I'm afraid to turn up the knob!
customer_reviews.author: SloopJohnB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toaster, cheap results.
customer_reviews.text: I will edit this review if I don't return this tomorrow. It toasts more unevenly than the one I threw away to replace. Top half toast bottom half not. I have pictures of medium toast obviously showing this issue. Will try one more time and return if same result.
customer_reviews.author: TMacK

customer_reviews.title: The Only Toaster That Makes Perfect Toast
customer_reviews.text: My husband is beyond fussy about his toast. I am embarrassed to say I bought and returned 2 other popular toasters before buying this Hamilton Beach. It actually toasts both sides the same, an even light brown. If you really use toast for breakfast or sandwiches,like BLT, you probably need this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Marijo

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: Mine does toast, but not evenly. On the middle setting it toasts dark at top and gradually lighter as it goes down, to almost no toasting at bottom. Both slots toast exactly the same, if you call that toasting evenly. Very disappointed. I will have to return it. I have never had a toaster that toasted so poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Murray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Despite its price, it does exactly what I want done and well. It has the cancel button so I don't have to ruin everything by yanking it up. It has the bagel mode which I doubt I will use but why not have it. Yada yada, easy to clean and easy to use. Good product from a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: -click helpful if helpful- Honestly our toaster broke so we just bought the cheapest one we found and boy are we happy we have this one. It’s been great and it was much cheaper than others in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple days
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple uses. It would no longer stay down so I ultimately returned it and got a different toaster
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product. A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toaster.. great for bagels and toast....very simple. No complex buttons and stupid attachments. GREAT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this toaster for about a month, but so far I really love it.!!! It doesn’t take up a lot of space on the counter and I like the feature that you can lift the handle to take out your toast easily. Nice variety of toast settings also.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this toaster. I purchased it to replace an old toaster that was past its prime. It looks sharp and fits in great with the colors of my kitchen. Fits all breads great too. No issues, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CEASTL

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now and am pleased with it. I bought and threw away 3 toasters in the last year because they didn't pop up or the darkness settings meant nothing or the bagel setting didn't work. This one has worked well and has easy to see large buttons for bagel and cancel.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I can fit a bagel in it and there is ...
customer_reviews.text: I can fit a bagel in it and there is a special setting for them so it toasts the one side and not the other. It is hot and toasted with the side you put cream cheese on.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Toaster is fine but the shipping experience was terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing was wrong with the toaster; however, when it arrived it was on my front porch in the toaster box with a sticker on the outside of it. Thank goodness it was just a $25 toaster, otherwise I'm sure it would have immediately been stolen off of my porch. Unacceptable and unprofessional to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Pugh

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW TOASTER
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster, slots nice and wide unlike some of the other toasters that say they are wide and aren't. VERY PLEASE WITH THIS PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is cheaply made and more importantly it doesn't toast evenly. It's going back for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mahi

customer_reviews.title: Replace my toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for Hamilton Beach to get back to me, one side of the bread gets toasted. Had on line chat with customer service if Amazon and explained my problem on 7/3 and she told me she or Hamilton would get back to me..... nothing so far!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Videto

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. This toaster is broken in less than two months of normal use. The warranty says manufacturer should cover it but then I have to pay for all the shipping, which is probably more than the toaster itself. I bought this because the reviews were simple, why pay much for a toaster, I mean all toasters do toast, right?! Fool of me, cheap here is a waste. I wish Amazon would refund me for this, in the end, they're responsible for selling this piece of metal and plastic garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia

customer_reviews.title: A bit temperamental but useful. If you are planning to make more than ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit temperamental but useful. If you are planning to make more than 2 slices of toast, lower the temperature a bit so the second batch doesn't get too dark.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Happy "Bageling" made easy.
customer_reviews.text: Like the simplicity. Seems to work well both on bagles and on toast. A bit light...but no probleml
customer_reviews.author: Les Farthing

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is exactly what I wanted. Toasts bread and bagels evenly, with just the right crispness. Excellent product for the price. I highly recommend Hamilton Beach products.
customer_reviews.author: MamaM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it didn't!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly until it didn't! I've had it just shy of a full year, now I have to replace it. It will no longer keep lever down to toast anything, I have to hold it down until its ready, which is pretty dangerous as it sparks when I let it go.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: it has this really bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this toaster for months now and every time I use it, it has this really bad chemical smell. I’m honestly terrified to eat anything I toast. Bad toaster I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: I'm now an empty nester and I'm happy with this 2-slice toaster for just the two of us. By the way, it toats the bread evenly on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but disappointed and wish I purchased a better product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, but smells of metal, although I don’t use it that often. hoping the new toaster smell will eventually disappear with time And use.
customer_reviews.author: j. b. quillen

customer_reviews.title: Good - while it lasted (which wasn’t long)
customer_reviews.text: Simple toaster that get’s the job done. Unfortunately it stopped working after 6 months. Doesn’t stay down anymore. Would have expected to get a bit more than 6 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: IT Gal

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Basic toaster, very it gets the job done pretty well in my view. The browning is even and good and it makes the toast crunchy the way I like it. I have used toasters from other bigger names that could never get the broad to be crunchy the way I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Oyeols

customer_reviews.title: 😔
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't cook the bread evenly,it has to be turned up on a high number
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Frazer

customer_reviews.title: didn't work after a short while
customer_reviews.text: It worked nicely...for a few days. Now if you put it on highest setting (7) it browns an English muffin as if on medium. You couldn't burn anything on this particular toaster. I think we just got a lemon that's all. BTW for some reason there's no toasters to be had in WalMart or other stores. WTH? So we had to order one online.
customer_reviews.author: Doris P Earle

customer_reviews.title: The Toast is finally Done!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. I think it’s made more for a bagel than toast. I had to put the number all the way up to get my sourdough bread toasted. Eventually it’s done. Now a bagel is perfect, make sure you turn it down!
customer_reviews.author: Tici Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Returned
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be hit and miss. Mine toasted very unevenly because only half the elements on the inside of both slots heated up. New toaster was actually worse than the 10 yr old toaster it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: robert russell

customer_reviews.title: Multi Function Toaster works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster Defrost is perfect for frozen waffles. Defrosted.... and then you can toast them as usual The Bagel setting is great , and only toast on the cut size. So far so good. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: George D Halas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Bagels and Texas Toast! The toaster works perfectly and is very Modern to look at! YUMMY!
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: Solid toaster
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! I love the sleek look of it and the way the dial works on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Varsha

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2019 and probably didn't use 20 times and now it only toasts on the inside. outside doesn't heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple toaster and this was perfect. A good price, and large slice-openings make a just right for me. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Well, I mean, it's a toaster
customer_reviews.text: It toasts things. Bread, English muffins,bagels, yep, it toasts them all. What else can you really say about a toaster?
customer_reviews.author: truthseeker1970

customer_reviews.title: Just an average toaster...
customer_reviews.text: An old but great toaster finally gave it up, so I needed to get a new one. After brief scan of assorted reviews I settled on this toaster. The wide slots are great, but they aren't long enough for rye bread or other breads like sourdough from the local bakeries. But I guess this is progress, still miss the old one though. If you think a toaster is just a toaster than this is an OK toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast and even
customer_reviews.text: No issues with frozen items, plenty of wattage to handle anything you might want to toast, and most importantly, it toasts evenly!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This toaster offers all that you need. I really like the size of the item and it does take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: DPalm

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: This toaster only browns on the inside of toast. If I hadn’t got rid of the box, I would have returned. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defects
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and easy to use. The major defects are the some heating elements are stuck behind the metal sides and the elements that do come threw toast unevenly. I'm disappointed in Hamilton Beach.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It has settings to toast both sides or just one side with a push of a button. Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: charles rose

customer_reviews.title: Styling
customer_reviews.text: Works good. A little pricey but expect it to last being a H.B
customer_reviews.author: James the Ordained

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Gets the job done Defrost button is cool Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Baby_ale

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mom, who needed a toaster to fit in the limited space of her countertop. It's an attractive design and easy to use. She loves it and uses it daily. It's held up well over the past couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: 24FM

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week
customer_reviews.text: I got fooled by the many good reviews. This is built cheap that after two uses it broke. The build quality is really cheap. Just pay a little extra and purchase somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is trash! Not worth your money the bottom part kept opening every time you move it. Plastic cheap! Total return!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster! Always consistent and cooks evenly. Haven't tried the bagel option yet but looking forward to it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had one and it finally wore out so I’m happy with the updated version
customer_reviews.author: edna5454

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Extra-wide 2  Slice Slot Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a very nice product. It looks good too. I haven't tried and bagels in it yet, but I have toasted some buns in it and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Locke

customer_reviews.title: It's ok works ok.
customer_reviews.text: I find that the inside coils toast better then the out side ones wich is pretty cool for Bengals. It still functions well for it's cost though. A
customer_reviews.author: BigPapaD

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better toaster
customer_reviews.text: Barely works. I got this item less then a month ago! It doesn’t toast the bread evenly and then when the item is done toasting there’s no indication that it’s done. (Is no noise or doesn’t pop up)
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I used the toaster 1 time and sent it back as it did not brown my toast even at the highest level.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The wide slots are welcome -- the cord is short limiting placement on counter. It's a toaster -- it works.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Light a a feather. simple settings
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster sol much I bought another for a gift for out bachelor son when his old one broke.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sharp

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this item for my daughter, she’s very happy with it and says that her morning bagel comes out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 2.5 months and it was only being used 1-2 times per week at most. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: bruce elkins

customer_reviews.title: it's great for the price
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i don't like about this toaster is that it's easy to change the setting by bumping it. but for the price it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is great for bagels
customer_reviews.text: I found this toaster does a great job with bagels and toast. I have not yet found the sweet spot for.my favorite bread but I finally get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for regular bread toasting
customer_reviews.text: Was worried if it was hold gluten free toast as I wanted to use the toaster for that as well as bagels. It is perfect. No problem. Easy to clean love it. Thanks love it’s been
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou Bradford

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: ive use it for 6 days and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jehily Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but okay.
customer_reviews.text: Although this is very easy to use, cool to the touch on the exterior, I'm disappointed in how uneven and of how small of an area of toasting this provides.
customer_reviews.author: copchick3430

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend, spend more & upgrade. , this one won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Cheep product, get what you pay for. Heating element went out on one side less than 6 months
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Slots wide enough for bagels and long enough for the larger size sliced bread. The three buttons add convenience and value.
customer_reviews.author: B P C

customer_reviews.title: Toasts fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little toaster! Plenty of room for bagels and it takes very little time to toast compared to our old toaster.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It’s doing what it’s supposed to do. I prefer my bread lightly toasted and it did just that when set between 2 and 3.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette L.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple but, well designed toaster. It make toast consistently every time without burning.
customer_reviews.author: william r mccallum

customer_reviews.title: Burnt buns
customer_reviews.text: Hmm will give it another try next time. This toaster is burning my buns at lvl2
customer_reviews.author: GoGo

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the toaster is great. It’s slim and fits nicely in the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 2 Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto Shutoff, Black (22633)
product_meta.description: Style Name:2 SliceHamilton Beach extra-wide slot toaster bagel setting toasts the cut side, warms the round side. With the Hamilton Beach extra-wide slot toaster, toasting bread is just the beginning. Extra-wide slots make it ideal for bagels, English muffins or slices of artisan bread. A special bagel setting lets you toast The cut side, while Warming the outside. Bring frozen waffles or pancakes to a warm, golden finish with the defrost button, which thaws then toasts the food. The 2-Slice toaster is simple to use with a toast boost feature that gives breads a high lift for removal. And the automatic shutoff will turn the toaster off at the end of its cycle, even if food gets jammed. With brushed stainless steel accents and illuminated buttons, This toaster will look great on your countertop. Key features: 2 slice capacity extra-wide slots accommodate bagels and thick breads three toasting functions: bagel, defrost and cancel bagel setting - toasts the cut side, warms for the round side defrost function thaws food then toasts it cancel stops toasting at any time high-lift toast boost makes it easier to reach small slices adjustable shade selector for perfect toast batch after batch crumb tray cool-touch sides illuminated buttons auto shutoff - toaster shuts off at end of Cycle, even if toast gets jammed extra-wide slots fit Thick slices of Texas toast or artisan breads into the toaster without the worry of smooshing. And removal is easy with the toast boost feature, which lifts food higher when done. Bagel technology toast only one side, while Warming the outside, of a cut bagel, English muffin or bun with the bagel setting. Multifunctional for busy mornings with toasting functions including bagel, defrost as well as a shade selector, The Hamilton Beach extra-wide slot toaster lets you easily toast up a variety of breakfast favorites in just a push of a button.
feature_bullets: Extra-wide slots: this 2-Slice toaster has extra-wide slots to fit Thick slices of artisan bread or Texas toast, bagels, or a variety of breakfast favorites.
Bagel & defrost settings: The 2-Slice toaster perfectly toasts the cut side while Warming the outside with the bagel setting. Defrost setting thaws then toasts waffles or pancakes.
High-lift toast boost: removal of smaller breads, like English muffins, from the toaster is easy with the toast boost feature, which lifts foods a little higher than usual when done.
Adjustable shade selector for shade preference: bagel toaster has an adjustable shade selector for perfect toast batch after batch.
Crumb tray: The crumb tray on this 2-Slice toaster is easy to remove and clean.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,962 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
